issue.title: [R] Make doc examples less noisy
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13519](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13519). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Run testthat::test_examples() and see all of the output. Some, like write_to_raw, should assign their output so they don't print so much.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13519?focusedCommentId=17393420) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 10851
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10851>
